jklann.hqmf
Class JerseyServer

java.lang.Object
  jklann.hqmf.JerseyServer

public class JerseyServer
extends java.lang.Object

Jeff Klann - 7/9/2012 Borrowed almost exactly from the example on Jersey's site, this starts up a Grizzly HTTPD server with Jersey running inside using the appropriate HQMF resources. Base URL is read from hqmf.properties.
